00051 
00052 bool CCMSFileData::Read()
00053 {
00054         // Check if file exists
00055         if (Exists() == false)
00056                 return false;
00057 
00058         // Open the file
00059         if (Open() == false)
00060         {
00061                 Close();
00062                 return false;
00063         }
00064         return true;
00065 }
00066 
00068 
00069 bool CCMSFileData::ReadHeader()
00070 {
00071         // Check if file exists
00072         if (Exists() == false)
00073                 return false;
00074 
00075         // Open the file
00076         if (Open(true) == false)
00077         {
00078                 Close();
00079                 return false;
00080         }
00081         return true;
00082 }
00083 
00085 
00086 bool CCMSFileData::Open(bool bReadHeaderOnly)
00087 {
00088         // First close the file.
00089         Close();
00090 
00091         return ReadFile(bReadHeaderOnly);
00092 }

00095 
00096 void CCMSFileData::Close()
00097 {
00098         m_arrayList.clear();
00099         m_snpList.clear();
00100 }

00104 bool CCMSFileData::ReadFile(bool bReadHeaderOnly)
00105 {
00106         try
00107         {
00108                 ostringstream strstrm;
00109                 int iCT=0;
00110                 string strSection, strKey, strValue, strUnit, strChipType;
00111                 int nValue=0;
00112                 int nUnit=0;
00113                 CIniFile iniFile;
00114 
00115                 // Get file version
00116                 strValue = iniFile.GetValue(CMS_HEADER_KEY_VERSION, CMS_SECTION_HEADER, m_strFileName);
00117                 nValue = atoi(strValue.c_str());
00118                 m_Header.SetVersion(nValue);
00119 
00120                 // Get assay
00121                 strValue = iniFile.GetValue(CMS_HEADER_KEY_ASSAY, CMS_SECTION_HEADER, m_strFileName);
00122                 m_Header.SetAssay(strValue.c_str());
00123 
00124                 // Get array type count
00125                 strValue = iniFile.GetValue(CMS_HEADER_KEY_ARRAYCOUNT, CMS_SECTION_HEADER, m_strFileName);
00126                 nValue = atoi(strValue.c_str());
00127                 m_Header.SetArrayCount(nValue);
00128 
00129                 // Get common SNP count
00130                 strValue = iniFile.GetValue(CMS_HEADER_KEY_SNPCOUNT, CMS_SECTION_HEADER, m_strFileName);
00131                 nValue = atoi(strValue.c_str());
00132                 m_Header.SetSNPCount(nValue);
00133 
00134                 // Stop if just reading the header.
00135                 if (bReadHeaderOnly)
00136                         return true;
00137 
00138                 // Read data section list of array types
00139                 strValue = iniFile.GetValue(CMS_DATA_TYPES, CMS_SECTION_DATA, m_strFileName);
00140 
00141                 // Parse array types
00142                 string::size_type lastPos = strValue.find_first_not_of(CMS_DATA_DEL, 0);
00143                 string::size_type pos     = strValue.find_first_of(CMS_DATA_DEL, lastPos);
00144                 while (std::string::npos != pos || std::string::npos != lastPos)
00145                 {               
00146                         // Get and store all parsed tokens
00147                         strChipType = strValue.substr(lastPos, pos - lastPos);
00148                         m_arrayList.insert(map<int,string>::value_type(iCT++, strChipType));
00149 
00150                         // Skip delimiters and find next "non-delimiter" (1st delimiter)
00151                         lastPos = strValue.find_first_not_of(CMS_DATA_DEL, pos);
00152                         pos = strValue.find_first_of(CMS_DATA_DEL, lastPos);
00153                 }
00154 
00155                 // Loop to get common SNPs              
00156                 for (int iSNP=0; iSNP<m_Header.GetSNPCount(); ++iSNP)
00157                 {               
00158                         SNPTypeInfo snp;
00159 
00160                         // Read next SNP line
00161                         strstrm.str("");
00162                         strstrm << CMS_DATA_SNP << iSNP+1;
00163                         strValue = iniFile.GetValue(strstrm.str().c_str(), CMS_SECTION_DATA, m_strFileName);
00164 
00165                         // Store SNP ID
00166                         snp.snpID = strstrm.str();
00167 
00168                         // Parse SNP IDs
00169                         iCT=0;
00170                         std::string::size_type lastPos = strValue.find_first_not_of(CMS_DATA_DEL, 0);
00171                         std::string::size_type pos     = strValue.find_first_of(CMS_DATA_DEL, lastPos);
00172                         while (std::string::npos != pos || std::string::npos != lastPos)
00173                         {               
00174                                 // Get nex snpID
00175                                 strUnit = strValue.substr(lastPos, pos - lastPos);
00176                                 nUnit = atoi(strUnit.c_str());
00177 
00178                                 // Store chiptype and snpID into map
00179                                 if (iCT < (int)m_arrayList.size())
00180                                 {
00181                                         strChipType = m_arrayList[iCT++];
00182                                         snp.chiptype_to_unit.insert(map<string,int>::value_type(strChipType, nUnit));
00183                                 }
00184 
00185                                 // Skip delimiters and find next "non-delimiter" (1st delimiter)
00186                                 lastPos = strValue.find_first_not_of(CMS_DATA_DEL, pos);
00187                                 pos = strValue.find_first_of(CMS_DATA_DEL, lastPos);
00188                         }
00189 
00190                         // Insert common SNP structure
00191                         m_snpList.push_back(snp);
00192                 }
00193         }
00194         catch(...)
00195         {
00196                 m_strError = "Unspecified read error.";
00197                 return false;
00198         }
00199 
00200         return true;
00201 }

00204 
00205 bool CCMSFileData::Exists()
00206 {
00207         // Find the file stats.
00208         struct stat st;
00209         if (stat(m_strFileName.c_str(), &st) == 0)
00210         {
00211                 return true;
00212         }
00213         else
00214         {
00215                 m_strError = "CMS file " + m_strFileName + " doesn't exist";
00216                 return false;
00217         }
00218 }
